sentence: There's a lack of food here - it's my boyfriend's fault!

sentence: I am thinking about passing my exams constantly all day.

sentence_tra: 既然你不吃了，我就把剩下的食物倒（处理）掉。

sentence: All my furniture is easily moveable.

sentence: Every autumn I need to sweep up the fallen leaves.

sentence: Oh no! I think we are stuck in the mud!

sentence: My chiropractor made adjustments to my spine to help correct my back problems.

sentence: Make sure to recycle all your plastic bottles.

mean_cn: n. 女服务员，女管家，女干事

sentence: I would love to take a carriage ride with you in the park.

sentence: The stewards are responsible for serving passengers on the plane.

sentence: The little girl imitates her mother when she exercises.

sentence: Instant noodles are convenient.

The family finally had an opportunity to buy their own house.

sentence: They'll publish my book both electronically and in print.
sentence_tra: 他们会出版我的书，电子版和印刷版都有。

mean_cn: n.主管，酋长，长官adj.主要的，首席的
sentence: The boss smokes a cigar and relaxes; it's good to be the chief.
sentence_tra: 老板抽着烟放松自在，做老板真好。

sentence: The nurse will assist you in walking to your car.
sentence_tra: 护士会搀扶你走向你的车。

mean_cn: adj.令人钦佩的，极好的，值得赞扬的
sentence: Her skills are very admirable.
sentence_tra: 她技能卓越。

mean_cn: vi. 指责, 指控;  vt. 指责, 控告, 把…归咎于, 使暴露;
sentence: They accused each other of being wrong.
sentence_tra: 他们相互指责对方做错了。

mean_cn: n.分配，委派；任务，(课外)作业
sentence: My teacher gave me a lot of homework assignments for the weekend.
sentence_tra: 我的老师在周末的时候给了我很多家庭作业和课外任务。

sentence: The accountant makes a thorough evaluation of our books.
sentence_tra: 这个会计对我们的账簿进行了详细的审核。

mean_cn: v.更新，使现代化；使靠最近n.更新
sentence: I downloaded an update for my software.
sentence_tra: 我给软件下载了升级包。

sentence: The journalist interviews her guests on TV.
sentence_tra: 记者电视采访她的嘉宾。

mean_cn: n. 勺，铲子，独家新闻v. 挖，掘
sentence: I'd just like one scoop of ice cream, please.
sentence_tra: 来一勺冰淇淋，谢谢。

sentence: That accusation is outrageous - I never stole your car!
sentence_tra: 这指控令我非常吃惊 - 我从没偷过你的车！

mean_cn: n. 区域；部分；章节v.划分，切开
sentence: You can find jobs in the classifieds section of the newspaper.
sentence_tra: 你能在报纸的分类单元找到工作。

sentence: The interviewee is very qualified for the job and also has a great personality.
sentence_tra: 被面试者非常胜任这份工作，人也很不错。

sentence: At only four years old, she's already an amateur photographer.
sentence_tra: 虽然只有四岁，她已经俨然是个小小业余摄影师了。

mean_cn: adj. 难取悦的，苛求的；；费力的
sentence: My demanding wife won't take 'No' for an answer.
sentence_tra: 我苛求的妻子从不接受“不”的回答。

mean_cn: adj.年长的；资格老的，地位较高的n.(大学或高中)毕业生
sentence: Senior citizens should be respected.
sentence_tra: 年长的人应该被尊重。

sentence: She was a gifted musician, even as a little girl.
sentence_tra: 她是个有天赋的音乐家，即使她是个小女孩。

sentence: He has an office job, but his passion is photography.
sentence_tra: 他有一份办公室的工作，但他的兴趣是摄影。

sentence: Ok, we're guilty - just please don't kill us!
sentence_tra: 好吧，我们有罪。请不要杀我们。

mean_cn: adj.不平常的，少有的；与众不同的
sentence: She has an unusual way of eating. She doesn't use her hands.
sentence_tra: 她吃饭的方式很不寻常――她从不用手！

mean_cn: adv. 技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上
sentence: Repairing computer circuits is a technically difficult job.
sentence_tra: 修电脑主板是很难的技术活儿。

sentence: This project has been a long process.
sentence_tra: 这个项目经历了一个很长的流程。

sentence: Why does he deliberately try to trip other people?
sentence_tra: 为什么他要故意伸脚绊别人？

mean_cn: n. 照片;  vi. 拍照;  vt. 为…拍照;
sentence: After my vacation I showed my friends all of my travel photographs.
sentence_tra: 在假期之后我向朋友们展示了所有旅途中的照片。

sentence: This is the newest edition of the book.
sentence_tra: 这是这本书最新的版本了。

sentence: She is a good housewife. She always stays home to cook and clean.
sentence_tra: 她是个优秀的家庭主妇。她总是呆在家里做饭打扫。

sentence: She is delighted that she finished her work.
sentence_tra: 她很高兴她完成了工作。

sentence: I'm trying to lose weight, so I have to deny myself that delicious cake.
sentence_tra: 我在减肥，所以我得拒绝那美味的蛋糕。

sentence: This is quite a dilemma--how will I ever solve this problem?
sentence_tra: 这真是一个进退两难的窘境！我该怎么解决这个问题？

sentence: You can find all our men's shirts in the Men's Department.
sentence_tra: 你能在男装区找到我们全部的男士衬衫。

sentence: The photographer is taking pictures with a camera.
sentence_tra: 摄影师在用照相机拍照。

sentence: They will polish your car and make it shine!
sentence_tra: 他们会把你的车擦得闪亮！

mean_cn: adj. 想像的;  富于想像力的;  虚构的;
sentence: He is very imaginative; he's always coming up with new ideas.
sentence_tra: 他非常有想象力，总是想出新点子。
